name: Lutine's Support
description: Draw 2 cards. Both sides gain the following effect: "After a character uses a Skill, randomly be healed for 2 HP or take 2 Piercing DMG. Usage(s): 2"
descriptionraw: Draw 2 cards. Both sides gain the following effect: "After a character uses a Skill, randomly be healed for 2 HP or take 2 $[K5]. $[K3]: 2"
descriptionreplaced: Draw 2 cards. Both sides gain the following effect: "After a character uses a Skill, randomly be healed for 2 HP or take 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color>. <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 2"
